Introduction
This topic contains information on regulatory bars to benefits, including
bars established by 38 CFR 3.12(d)
discharge in lieu of trial
an offense involving moral turpitude
, and
willful and persistent misconduct
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A  - Character of Discharge (COD) and Bars to Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section A
